A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have never felt so compelled to write a review after seeing a movie until see The Last Jedi. This was supposed to be the Star Wars movies above all Star Wars movies\, and I was certainly disappointed. Being a big fan of the Star Wars franchise\, my initial response was to defend the movie after seeing it for the first time. But I found myself unsure as to why I was defending it at all. There were some beautiful shots and moments\, but overall the story was mediocre. It gave the audience very little fan service to touch upon loved classic characters\, introduced new characters unnecessarily\, AND ONLY HAD ONE LIGHTSABER FIGHT SCENE. You would think with today's technology\, we would get at least two lightsaber fights. Overall\, and underwhelming Star Wars film.
